attributes.action: admit that the e-petitions on this website are are a disgusting PR exercise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fed up with that pathetic spin laden response from "the Prime Minister" spouting the determination and dedication of the government? Upset that our petitions are merely used as a means to email us more lies and spin? Then this would be the petition to sign next... lets see what utter nonsense gets sent out in response to this one.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
